2007-12-20

Best shows of 2007

Not too many shows this year (although maybe more than last) - and a couple I never took my camera to, most notably Sparklehorse at The Shepherds Bush Empire and Joanna Newsom at the Albert Hall which would both be very near, if not at the top, of my list...

In no particular order...

  • The Clientele @ St Giles in the Fields (review)
  • Kristin Hersh @ The Arts Theatre, London (review)
  • The Decemberists @ The Shepherds Bush Empire (review)
  • Espers (review)
  • A Hawk & A Hacksaw (review)
  • Ba-a-a-a-a-a-by (review1 | review2)
  • Damon & Naomi (review)
  • St Vincent @ The Bush Hall (review)
  • Alan - 8 second exposure (review)
